name: CJET Holdings, Inc.
description: CJET Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative aviation solutions, specializing in aircraft leasing, maintenance, and asset management services. Established in 2010, the company has rapidly grown to become a significant player in the global aviation market. CJET aims to support airlines and aviation companies by providing flexible leasing options, ensuring that clients have access to the latest aircraft technology without the burden of ownership. The company’s portfolio includes a diverse range of aircraft types, from regional jets to large commercial airplanes, catering to a wide array of aviation needs. With a focus on operational efficiency and cost-effectiveness, CJET also offers comprehensive aircraft maintenance services, ensuring that clients’ fleets operate at peak performance. The company is committed to sustainability in aviation, actively exploring eco-friendly technologies and practices to minimize the environmental impact of air travel. CJET’s mission is to enhance connectivity and travel experiences while fostering a sustainable future for the aviation industry.

seo.meta_title: CJET Holdings, Inc. | Aviation Solutions & Aircraft Leasing
seo.meta_description: Explore CJET Holdings, Inc., a leader in aviation solutions specializing in aircraft leasing and maintenance services. Learn about our innovative offerings and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does CJET offer?
faq.answer: CJET offers aircraft leasing, maintenance services, and asset management solutions for the aviation industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CJET Holdings, Inc.?
faq.answer: Jessica Tran is the CEO of CJET Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is CJET headquartered?
faq.answer: CJET is headquartered in Miami, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What types of aircraft does CJET lease?
faq.answer: CJET leases a variety of aircraft including narrow-body jets, wide-body jets, and regional aircraft.
